typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		inss_identifier as string,
		organizationid as string,
		inss_debttypeid as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		inss_name as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		strINSSDebtTypeId as string,
		strINSSName as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidation
sourceValidation select(mapColumn(
		inss_identifier,
		organizationid,
		inss_debttypeid,
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		createdby,
		modifiedon,
		modifiedby,
		createdon,
		inss_name,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		blIsValid,
		tsModifiedOn,
		tsCreatedOn,
		strINSSDebtTypeId,
		strINSSName,
		blIsTruncate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSink
AlterRowSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/references-bss/debttype',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strINSSDebtTypeId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkODS
